transfers.locked-tooltip: Έχετε μια μεταφορά προς εκκίνηση. Οι μεταφορές δε μπορούν να εκκινήσουν όσο ο λογαριασμός σας είναι κλειδωμένος. Ξεκλειδώστε για να συνεχίσετε.
transfers.tooltip: Έχετε μια μεταφορά προς εκκίνηση. Εάν κλείσετε το Nash ή αποσυνδεθείτε, θα παραμείνει σε παύση μέχρι να συνδεθείτε ξανά.

password-tips.title: Tips for a strong password
password-tips.desc: A strong password is essential to keep your funds secure. Follow these tips to stay safe:
password-tips.tip-1: Do not reuse a password from other websites, even if you change individual words or characters. If you are phished or hacked elsewhere, your Nash account will instantly be compromised.
password-tips.tip-2: Do not include personal information in your password. Names, birthdays and addresses are easy to find out and should be avoided.
password-tips.tip-3: Make your password at least twelve characters long and use a mixture of upper and lowercase letters, numbers and special characters.
password-tips.tip-4: Consider using a password generator to create and store maximally secure passwords.

password.desc: Use a mixture of upper and lowercase letters, numbers and special characters for a stronger password.

verify-email.desc-1: Please check your email and verify your account.
verify-email.desc-2: If you don’t see our email, check your junk folder.

general-information.title: General information
general-information.desc-1: Ο προσωπικός σας λογαριασμός δημιουργήθηκε χρησιμοποιώντας 12 μυστικές λέξεις. Εάν χάσετε τον κωδικό σας, μπορείτε να επαναφέρετε το λογαριασμό σας χρησιμοποιώντας αυτές τις λέξεις. Οπότε, θα πρέπει να κρατήσετε οπωσδήποτε αντίγραφο ασφαλείας αυτών των λέξεων.

chart.card-top-right: Επαναφορά λογαριασμού Nash εάν χαθεί ο κωδικός πρόσβασης

secret-words.desc: Αυτές οι λέξεις χρησιμοποιούνται για την πρόσβαση στα χρήματά σας. Επίσης, θα χρειαστούν σε περίπτωση απώλειας του κωδικού σας.
secret-words.popup-error: Εάν επιθυμείτε εκτύπωση των λέξεων, παρακαλούμε απενεργοποιήστε τυχόν αποκλειστές αναδυόμενων παραθύρων και επιτρέψτε στο Nash να ανοίγει αναδυόμενα παράθυρα.

tips.dont: Μην αποθηκεύετε τις λέξεις ψηφιακά η με στιγμιότυπο οθόνης.

print-warning.title: Εκτυπώστε τις δώδεκα μυστικές λέξεις
print-warning.header: Παρακαλούμε βεβαιωθείτε οτι ο εκτυπωτής είναι ασφαλής!
print-warning.body-desc: Εάν επιλέξετε να εκτυπώσετε τις λέξεις σας, βεβαιωθείτε πρώτα:
print-warning.body-tips-0: Ο εκτυπωτής είναι απευθείας συνδεδεμένος με τον υπολογιστή με καλώδιο USB.
print-warning.body-tips-1: Ο εκτυπωτής δεν έχει σύνδεση με κανενός είδους δίκτυο.
print-warning.body-tips-2: Είναι αδύνατο σε άλλους να συνδεθούν με τον εκτυπωτή σας μέσω Bluetooth, WLAN, κ.λ.π..

backup-print.desc-1: Οι δώδεκα μυστικές λέξεις μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν για την πρόσβαση σε ETH, NEO και άλλους λογαριασμούς σας, εάν χάσετε τον κωδικό σας στο Nash.
backup-print.desc-2: Να θυμάστε: εάν κάποιος αποκτήσει πρόσβαση στις λέξεις σας, τα χρήματά σας βρίσκονται σε κίνδυνο.
backup-print.desc-3: Κόψτε τις λωρίδες παρακάτω. Σκεφθείτε να τις πλαστικοποιήσετε και να τις αποθηκεύσετε σε δυο ξεχωριστές τοποθεσίες.

repeat-secret-words.desc: Θέλουμε να βεβαιωθούμε οτι γράψατε τις δώδεκα λέξεις σας.
repeat-secret-words.case-sensitive: Όλες οι λέξεις είναι με πεζούς χαρακτήρες

header.title: What is NEX staking?
header.desc: Staking Nash Exchange tokens (NEX) is a way to earn passive income. You receive a portion of the exchange’s trading fees every day that your stake is active.

par-1.title: How does it work?
par-1.desc: You lock as many of your NEX tokens as you want in a staking contract. You will not be able to move or sell your tokens while they are locked in the contract. Every day that your stake is active you will receive dividends.

par-2.title: How are dividends calculated?
par-2.desc: Dividends depend on: (1) the number of NEX tokens you stake as a proportion of the total 50,000,000 supply, and (2) the period of time for which you stake them. The more tokens you stake, the higher your dividend will be. The longer you stake your tokens for, the greater the proportion of fees you receive will be (your ‘staking rate’).

par-3.title: How long can I stake for?
par-3.desc: The minimum staking period is one month, which offers a staking rate of 25%. However, if you want a higher proportion of the exchange’s fees, you can stake for any whole number of months up to a maximum of 24, which offers a staking rate of 75%.

par-4.title: How do I receive my dividends?
par-4.desc: Dividends are automatically added to your trading contract balance. They are paid out on a daily basis, shortly after midnight UTC. Nash provides monthly staking statements that aggregate these payments into a single figure for accounting purposes. Since the fees on a trade are charged in the currency being exchanged, you will receive dividends in every asset currently being traded on Nash.

par-5.title: Can I receive my dividends in a single currency?
par-5.desc: No. For legal reasons, we cannot convert your dividends for you. However, we are developing a tool to allow you to convert dividends yourself with a single click.

par-6.title: Can I edit or cancel my stake once it’s been created?
par-6.desc: No. Once you have created a stake you will not be able to edit or cancel it.

par-7.title: Can I create multiple stakes?
par-7.desc: Yes. If you have NEX tokens in your personal account that are not already locked in a stake, you can use them to create a new one.

par-8.title: How many stakes can I create?
par-8.desc: There is no limit to the number of stakes you can create.

create-stake.create-stake-disclaimer-label: I understand that staked NEX only pays dividends if the Nash Exchange generates revenue.
create-stake.title: Create your stake
create-stake.amount-to-stake-tooltip:
Staking rate determines the size of your proportionate share of revenue from the Nash Exchange. The longer you stake your NEX, the higher your staking rate will be, with a maximum rate of 75% for a two-year stake.

<0>An example dividend</0>
Dividends are paid out daily. Say that Nash has generated fees equivalent to $1,000,000 in the last 24 hours and that a user owns 1,000 NEX tokens out of the total 50,000,000 supply. If the user has staked NEX at the two-year staking rate of 75%, they are eligible for a dividend worth: $1,000,000 ∗ 1,000 / 50,000,000 ∗ 0.75 = $15.
create-stake.set-date-dividends-label: Set a date to receive your dividends
create-stake.agreed-to-non-cancellation-label: I understand that I cannot cancel or edit this stake once I have created it.
